JavaCSVReader

Class StringUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • JavaCSVReader.StringUtils

  • public class StringUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    class to extend the utilities of the String class.

    NOTE: this class may contain methods that have nothing to do with the JavaCSVReader lib. : extra methods are kept for robotics team's usage in their FRC code.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Noah Harvey

      • split

        public static java.lang.String[] split(java.lang.String str,
                       java.lang.String delimiter,
                       boolean withEnd,
                       int initIndex)
        Split the given string around the delimiter given.
        Parameters:
        str - the string to split
        delimiter - the delimiter to use to split the string
        withEnd - return data that is found past the last delimiter?
        initIndex - the starting index to begin splitting around
        Returns:
        array of data found around the delimiters
        See Also:
        split(String,String,boolean,int)
